title: Add FO-06 KV store entries to seed.ts
description:
Add FO-06 prompt entries to the KV store seed script.

File to modify:
- `src/db/seed.ts`

KV keys to add (following codebase convention):
- `versions.fo-06-discovery.system.default` - Simplified discovery system prompt
- `versions.fo-06-affirmation.system.default` - Affirmation system prompt (can mirror FO-05)
- `versions.fo-06-summary.system.default` - Summary system prompt (can mirror FO-05)

The discovery prompt should be minimal - see agent.ts DEFAULT_INSTRUCTIONS for reference.

Reference: Look at existing FO-05 entries in seed.ts for format.

⚠️ Do not close until entries are added to seed.ts.
closed_reason: Added 16 KV entries for FO-06 agents to seed.ts
